topics.name: Mathematics
topics.description: The foundational study of numbers, quantities, and structures.

topics.name: Algebra
topics.description: The branch of mathematics dealing with symbols and the rules for manipulating those symbols.

topics.name: Geometry
topics.description: The branch of mathematics concerned with the properties and relations of points, lines, surfaces, and solids.

topics.name: Linear Algebra
topics.description: A subfield of algebra that is concerned with vector spaces and linear mappings between these spaces.

topics.name: Trigonometry
topics.description: The study of triangles and the relationships between their sides and angles.

topics.name: Calculus
topics.description: The branch of mathematics that studies continuous change, including differentiation and integration.

topics.name: Physics
topics.description: The science that studies matter, energy, and the interactions between them.

topics.name: Quantum Mechanics
topics.description: A fundamental theory in physics that describes the behavior of matter and energy on the atomic and subatomic scale.

topics.name: Machine Learning
topics.description: A field of computer science that focuses on using algorithms to allow computers to learn patterns and make predictions based on data.

topics.name: Artificial Intelligence
topics.description: The simulation of human intelligence processes by machines, especially computer systems.

topics.name: Data Science
topics.description: An interdisciplinary field focused on extracting knowledge and insights from data using scientific methods, processes, and systems.

topics.name: Engineering
topics.description: The application of scientific principles to design, build, and analyze machines, systems, and structures.

topics.name: Advanced Quantum Field Theory
topics.description: A theoretical framework in physics for constructing quantum mechanical models of subatomic particles and their interactions.
